text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Walking is moving body from one place to another by moving legs stepwise by self, capacity to bear weight of body and walk with effective gait within the range of speed from slow, moderate and fast pace.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Walking concept (NL-CM:4.3.3) of Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Mobility v3.3 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Mobility-v3.3(2020EN)).

comment.value: This Observation resource represents the Walking concept (NL-CM:4.3.3) of zib Mobility. It can be used together with the [zib-Mobility](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.

definition.value: Walking is moving body from one place to another by moving legs stepwise by self, capacity to bear weight of body and walk with effective gait within the range of speed from slow, moderate and fast pace.
